thread.title: Oscars 2017: Taraji P Henson makes a comeback on the red carpet
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Taraji P Henson makes a comeback on the red carpet

author: Olamide Olarewaju
title: Oscars 2017: Taraji P Henson makes a comeback on the red carpet
text: Tweet Taraji P Henson makes a daring statement on the Oscars 2017 red carpet. The top actor who had a major faux pas at the 2017 Grammy Award s that landed her in the top worst dressed for night after donning an unflattering Marc Jacobs piece turned around to serve thigh high slit gorgeousness on a bardot Alberta Ferretti piece for the red carpet.
